title: Best ADC This Season
body: Hey guys, im wondering what the best adc in s8 currently is, I have a feeling its kai'sai since she's being abused by low and high elo players but lemmi know in the poll below

replies.body: Not including Xayah? Shes consistently strong all game, good 1v1 and teamfight, multi-target CC, invulnerability.

rework graves true grit to give every 5th shot a ministun so sad hes fxxkxxg useless since rework

jhins better as a mid if u know how to clear with him .....

twitch is a better support, like ashe, but u can roam mid and jungle

vaynes been undisputed king since s02

Competitive: Varus
Soloqueue: Twitch (Kai'sa looks ok also, but remains not fully tested)

The best adc is either Xayah or Twitch. Twitch is consistently topping the adc winrate board since he just does so much damage and can run away with games after grabbing a lead in laning phase. Xayah is solid at all stages of the game and rewards skill, she's pretty much immune to assasin's if you're playing with a team that will group around you and can one shot squishies with her e.

kai sa is similar to azir where she can do really well but only really in high mmr where the team knows how to play around their adc. Trist is nerfed. Jhin is unreliable and trash when behind. Draven has many problems.
